paper_abstract: In this paper, we present the concept of directed line in fuzzy number space E, the definitions of integral and differential of fuzzy mappings from the directed line of fuzzy number space E into E, discuss their properties and obtain a theorem which is similar to the fundamental theorem of classical calculus. (C) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The integral of a fuzzy mapping over a directed line
